body: A KOR doujin with an amazing art style, not ntr or some other shit, AND features BOTH Madoka and Hikaru doing it with Kyosuke?!! This is the BEST KOR doujin from all time! 10000000000000000000/10. Good shit like this comes rare especially for the Kimagure Orange Road fans. And I am disappointed that I did not find this years ago on this website.
